name: EuroDNS
overview:
EuroDNS is a domain name registrar specializing in international domain name extensions. Based in Luxembourg with branch offices in Europe, the USA and Asia with AsiaDNS, EuroDNS serves a large variety of clients ranging from SMEs to some of the world’s largest Domain Investors, and offers dedicated naming solutions to Trademark holders. By strongly participating in leading industry forums, including ICANN and the International Trademark Association, EuroDNS seeks to promote e-commerce and wider Internet adoption.

EuroDNS targets its clients with constantly evolving solutions and services to assist with their domain needs. Services currently include domain transfers, domain forwarding, multiple profile and folder management, support helpdesk, domain consolidation, customer subfolders, bulk tools and a domain search engine.

The EuroDNS mission is to be a core domain name registrar in all countries and to have fully automated processes with the registries wherever applicable, whilst offering a user friendly, multilingual end-user interface.

EuroDNS is part of the DCL Group that also includes LuxCloud, DataCenter Luxembourg, voipGATE and eBrand Services.

milestones.description: EuroDNS is proud to announce its participation at the ICT Spring Europe 2012, Luxembourg, June 19-20
milestones.source_description: EuroDNS to attend ICT Spring Europe 2012
